Title: Le développeur toxique

Title: The price of batteries has declined by 97% in the last three decades

Title: Organised crime dealt ‘heavy blow’, says PM, after global police sting cracks open ‘encrypted’ app
Description: Prime Minister Scott Morrison says organised crime has been dealt a heavy blow after a cross-border law enforcement operation yielded mass raids and arrests using intelligence from a compromised encrypted app.
